Title: formatQuery
Description: Returns a formatted, possibly multi-line, version of the given SQL query.
Throws an exception if the query is not well-formed. To return NULL instead, function formatQueryOrNull() may be used.
query - The SQL query to be formatted. String
Examples: SELECT formatQuery('select a,    b FRom tab WHERE a > 3 and  b < 3');
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT formatQuery('select a,    b FRom tab WHERE a > 3 and  b < 3');
